input.sentences: french street fairs are a trip . we saw one last time we were there .
people were dressed up in period outfits and milling about in the streets .
this one kid | we never could decide if it was a girl or a really pretty boy .
there were all types of 18th century machinery being used out there | some we had to really guess what it was .
but no matter how hard these people tried to look the part | their modern tattoos kinda blew the whole back in time thing .
output.sentences: I took a trip to time street today!
The people acted as if they were from another time period
I roleplayed as a little kid from that time period.
I got to see the different types of machinery
I got a tattoo to remember the trip at the end.
